cause.description:
Fiery and Julie are getting married, and as such caring people they hope that their happiness will be shared, and have asked that donations be made in honor of their wedding to the American Cancer Society. For those of you who could not make it to the wedding, or who just really like Julie and/or Fiery, this is a great way to celebrate them.
1. In order to celebrate Julie and Fiery's wedding donate to the American Cancer Society.
cause.mission: Raise money for cancer research while celebrating the union of Julie Kobick and Fiery Cushman.
cause.name: Support Cancer Research In Honor of Fiery and Julie's Wedding
